preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 20 g of aluminum using a precision scale.
2. Measure 10 g of germanium.
3. Measure 15 g of lithium.
4. Measure 35 g of silicon.

6. Place all measured ingredients in a clean, dry mixing container.
